name: Space Wars (itch) (AndyGreen0608)
description:
This is a multiplayer PvP simple shooter game where the goal is to destroy the other player's Spaceship. 

FEATURES

The game however has 4 different types of Spaceships:

- The Basic Ship - Which has balanced stats

- The Attack Ship - Which has a stronger cannon to increase damage dealt but is slowed down due to engine weight

- The Armored Ship - Which has more armor built in to increase durability, but is slowed down due to armor weight

- The Speed Ship - Which has a Faster Engine but is less durable due to the ship having less space for armor.
